snippet: The National Youth Orchestra of the United States of America gave its debut performance on Thursday, then headed out on the road, giving talented teenagers a taste of the touring life.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews debut performance by National Youth Orchestra of the United States of America, conducted by Valery Gergiev, at Purchase College.
lead_paragraph: The National Youth Orchestra of the United States of America gave its debut performance on Thursday, then headed out on the road, giving talented teenagers a taste of the touring life.
